string.name: title_schedule
string.translation_description: The title for the schedule screen where user can see their schedule for Google I/O.

string.name: title_map
string.translation_description: The title for the map screen where user can see the map of the venue.

string.name: title_info
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: filters
string.translation_description: The label for the button to filter sessions by their topics, room, and so on.

string.name: category_heading_tracks
string.translation_description: Label in the filters panel above session topics (Android, Cloud, etc.)

string.name: category_heading_types
string.translation_description: Label in the filters panel above event types (Sessions, Codelabs, etc.)

string.name: clear_all
string.translation_description: The label for the button to clear all the filter conditions.

string.name: reset
string.translation_description: The label for the button to reset the filter conditions.

string.name: pinned_events_filter_description
string.translation_description: Message shown when the user toggles the switch to see their pinned events.

plurals.name: filter_event_count
plurals.translation_description: A label showing how many events match the current filters

string.name: agenda
string.translation_description: The title for the agenda screen where user can see all the sessions they plan to attend.

string.name: event_starred
string.translation_description: The message shown when user adds an event to their schedule.

resources.string: Event added to your starred items

string.name: event_unstarred
string.translation_description: The message shown when user removes an event from their schedule.

string.name: event_star_error
string.translation_description: The message shown for an error when user tries to add an event.

resources.string: Error adding event to starred items

string.name: reservation_error
string.translation_description: The message shown for an error when user is trying to reserve a session attendance.

resources.string: Error making changes to reservation. Wait for previous requests to finish or try again later.

string.name: reservation_request_succeeded
string.translation_description: The message shown when user tries to reserve a seat for a session.

string.name: reservation_cancel_succeeded
string.translation_description: The message shown when user has canceled their reservation for a session.

string.name: reservation_new
string.translation_description: The message shown when user's reservation is confirmed by the system.

resources.string: Your seat has been reserved for \"%s\".

string.name: reservation_replaced
string.translation_description: The message shown when user has chosen to replace a reservation for another and it is confirmed by the system.

string.name: waitlist_new
string.translation_description: The message shown when user is added to the waitlist of a session reservation.

string.name: waitlist_cancel_succeeded
string.translation_description: The message shown when user has canceled their reservation and was waitlisted for a session.

string.name: got_it
string.translation_description: The label for dismissing a information messages.

string.name: reservation_denied_cutoff
string.translation_description: The message shown when user's reservation is denied because the session starts too soon

resources.string: Reservation denied: too close to start time.

string.name: reservation_denied_clash
string.translation_description: The message shown when user's reservation is denied because they have reserved another event at that time

resources.string: Reservation denied: clash with another reservation

string.name: reservation_denied_unknown
string.translation_description: The message shown when user's reservation is denied because of an unknown error

string.name: cancellation_denied_cutoff
string.translation_description: The message shown when user is trying to cancel a reservation but it's denied because the session starts too soon

resources.string: Cancellation denied: too close to start time.

string.name: cancellation_denied_unknown
string.translation_description: The message shown when user is trying to cancel a reservation but it's denied because of an unknown error

string.name: schedule_tag_filters_empty
string.translationDescription: The message shown when a schedule page is empty because no events match the current filters.

resources.string: No events today match your current filters.

string.name: schedule_pinned_events_empty
string.translationDescription: The message shown when a schedule page is empty because no events are starred or reserved.

resources.string: You have no starred or reserved events today.

string.name: reservation_reservable
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which the user can request to reserve a seat.

string.name: reservation_reserved
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which the user has reserved a seat.

string.name: reservation_waitlisted
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which the user is on the waitlist.

string.name: reservation_waitlist_available
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which the user can join the waitlist.

string.name: reservation_disabled
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which the user cannot request a seat.

string.name: reservation_pending
string.translationDescription: Label shown on events for which a reservation request is pending.

string.name: schedule_hint_title
string.translationDescription: The title of the schedule hint dialog.

string.name: schedule_hint_view_only_your_events
string.translationDescription: The schedule hint for the switch that toggles if the attendee wants to see their pinned events.

string.name: schedule_hint_star_event
string.translationDescription: The schedule hint for the icon to star an event.

string.name: schedule_hint_reserve_session_seat
string.translationDescription: The schedule hint for the icon to reserve a session.

string.name: schedule_hint_star_event_content_description
string.translationDescription: The content description for the icon to star an event.

resources.string: An image to star an event

string.name: schedule_hint_reserve_session_seat_content_description
string.translationDescription: The content description for the icon to reserve a session.

resources.string: An image to reserve a session seat

string.name: rate_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to rate the session by 5 stars

string.name: menu_item_session_location
string.translation_description: The label for the location of the session.

string.name: menu_item_session_star
string.translation_description: The label for starring of the session.

string.name: session_detail_speakers_header
string.translation_descriptions: The label for the session speakers.

string.name: session_detail_related_header
string.translation_description: The label for the events related to this session.

string.name: info_title
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: event_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows interesting events, such as sessions and office hours.

string.name: travel_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows travel information, such as carpool and bus schedules.

string.name: faq_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows FAQ.

string.name: settings_title
string.translation_description: Title for the tab that shows all the settings of this app.

string.name: a11y_collapse_filters_sheet
string.translation_description: Description of a button to lower the filters sheet.

string.name: a11y_clear_tag_filters
string.translation_description: Description of a button to remove all current tag filters.

string.name: a11y_revert_pinned
string.translation_description: Description of a button to revert the switch that shows only starred and reserved events.

resources.string: TODO: a11y content description for sign in action
TODO: a11y content description for sign out action

string.name: a11y_reservation_available
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the button letting the user reserve a seat for a given event.

string.name: a11y_reservation_working
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button whilst it is working on processing a reservation.

string.name: a11y_reservation_reserved
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button when the user has reserved a seat.

string.name: a11y_reservation_disabled
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button when reservation is not available.

string.name: a11y_reservation_wait_list_available
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button when the user can join a wait list.

string.name: a11y_reservation_wait_listed
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button when the user is on a wait list for the event.

string.name: a11y_reservation_pending
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event reservation button when the user's reservation is pending.

string.name: a11y_starred
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event bookmark button when the event has been bookmarked.

string.name: a11y_unstarred
string.translation_description: Alternative text for the event bookmark button when the event has not been bookmarked.

string.name: a11y_star
string.translation_description: Alternate text for a button used for starring or unstarring events

string.name: a11y_play
string.translation_description: Alternate text for a button used to play a video

string.name: dialog_sign_in_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to customize your schedule

string.name: dialog_sign_in_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to save events, reserve seats and rate sessions (if an attendee). Actions will be synced from your account across app and site.

string.name: not_now
string.translation_description: The description of a button that the user doesn't want to sign in.

string.name: sign_in
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign in.

string.name: dialog_sign_out_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog. Used to confirm that the user wants to sign out.

string.name: dialog_sign_out_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. Used to confirm that the user wants to sign out.

resources.string: All saved events, seat reservations and session ratings (if an attendee) remain synced to your account.

string.name: sign_out
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign out.

string.name: remove_reservation_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog when the user is about to remove their reservation.

string.name: remove_reservation_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog when the user is about to cancel their reservation.

resources.string: You\'re about to give up your seat for \"%1$s\". If you decide not to reserve a seat but still want to attend, all sessions will have a portion of seats available first come, first serve onsite.

string.name: cancel
string.translation_description: The label of the button to keep the seat.

string.name: remove
string.translation_description: The label of the button to release the seat.

string.name: swap_reservation_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog when the user is about to change their reservation from one session to another.

string.name: swap_reservation_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog when the user is about to change their reservation from one session to another.

resources.string: You already have a reservation/waitlist for \"%1$s\"?. Only one reservation per time block is allowed. Would you like to swap for \"%2$s\"?

string.name: swap
string.translation_description: The label of the button to swap the reservation with another.

string.name: notifications_preference_dialog_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog for the notifications preference

string.name: notifications_preference_dialog_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog for the notifications preference

resources.string: Would you like to receive notifications about I/O? We\'ll send you information about session start times, after hours events, session recordings, and more. You can change this setting under \"Info > Settings\" at any time.

string.name: no
string.translation_description: Negative answer to the question \'Would you like to receive notification?\'

string.name: yes
string.translation_description: Positive answer to the question \'Would you like to receive notification?\'

item.translation_description: Unit for duration of time by hours. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Plural.

string.name: menu_item_share_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to share this session on SNS, etc.

string.name: share_text_session_detail
string.translation_description: The default message to be used when user is sharing an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: intent_chooser_session_detail
string.translation_description: The label for share screen where user can tell people about an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: onboarding_get_started
string.translation_description: The label for the button to start using the app.

string.name: onboarding_welcome_to_google_i_o
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown at the onboarding screen of the app.

string.name: onboarding_date_location
string.translation_description: The date and the place of Google I/O 2018.

string.name: onboarding_build_schedule
string.translation_description: The explanation title of the feature where user can choose which sessions to attend.

string.name: onboarding_build_sched_benefits
string.translation_description: The explanation of the feature where user can choose which sessions to attend.

resources.string: Build your custom I/O experience and reserve seats if you\'re an attendee

string.name: onboarding_watch_live
string.translation_description: The explanation title of the feature where user can watch I/O sessions by live stream.

string.name: onboarding_join_online
string.translation_description: The explanation of the feature where user can watch I/O sessions by live stream.

resources.string: Join us online. We\'ll be streaming the keynotes and most sessions live.

string.name: onboarding_label_days
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of days until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_hours
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_mins
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of minutes until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_seconds
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of seconds until the conference starts

plurals.name: session_starting_in
plurals.translation_description: A countdown timer for a session starting, e.g. 'Session starting in 5 minutes'. Will always be minutes

string.name: expanded
string.translation_description: The label used on a button when a view is in an expanded state.

string.name: collapsed
string.translation_description: The label used on a button when a view is in an collapsed state.

string.name: settings_time_zone_label
string.translate_description: Set time zone in app to PST.

string.name: settings_send_anonymous_usage_statistics
string.translation_description: Enable sending usage statistics.

string.name: settings_tos
string.translation_description: Open link to terms of service.

string.name: settings_privacy_policy
string.translation_description: Open link to privacy policy.

string.name: settings_oss_licenses
string.translation_description: Open link to open source licenses.

string.name: settings_version_label
string.translation_description: Version and build numbers.

string.name: built_with_material_content_description
string.translation_description: The app was built with Material Components.

string.name: day1
string.translation_description: Label for the first day of the conference

string.name: day2
string.translation_description: Label for the second day of the conference

string.name: day3
string.translation_description: Label for the third day of the conference

string.name: day1_date
string.translation_description: Actual date of the first day of the conference

string.name: day2_date
string.translation_description: Actual date of the second day of the conference
